author: Special Correspondent
text:
CULTURE

P.N. Raghavendra Rao Memorial Trust: Music programme, Arokiaswamy road west, R.S. Puram,

6.30 p.m.

GENERAL

Lions Club of Pollachi: Presenting free artificial limbs to 25 beneficiaries, Lions building, Pollachi, 5.30 p.m.

The Indian Chamber of Commerce and Industry Coimbatore: Interactive session with import and export trade of Coimbatore region, Chamber towers, Avinashi road, 5.30 p.m.

Poompuhar: Crafts mela, Meenakshi hall, Lakshmi Mills, 10 a.m.

Dr. R.V. Arts and Science College: Mathematics Association, valedictory, 3 p.m.

Hindusthan College of Arts and Science: Seminar on “Basic procedures in sales tax”, seminar hall,

2.30 p.m.

Dr. NGP Arts and Science College: Lecture on “Fluorescent Nanotods for Biological Applications”,

9.30 a.m.

SNS Group of Institutions: Junior Athletic Meet 2016, Nehru stadium, 8.30 a.m.

Yellow Tree Academy: Workshop on “Concept Art”, RHR (MAG Hall) & Kumaraguru College of Technology, 9.30 a.m.

Dr. NGP Arts and Science College: Guest lecture on “Diagnostic tools in Pulmonology”, Hall 407, 2 p.m.

Sri Jayendra Saraswathy Maha Vidyalaya College of Arts and Science: Entrepreneurship Awareness Camp, Seminar hall,

10.30 a.m.

Dhanalakshmi Srinivasan College of Engineering: Guest lecture on “Electromagnetic fields”, Seminar hall, 9.30 a.m.

Tejaa Shakthi Institute of Technology for Women: Inauguration of Music Club, 9.30 a.m. PSGR Krishnammal College for Women: Lecture, Recent Trends in Machine Learning, 9 a.m.

Sri Ranganathar Institute of Engineering and Technology: Eye screening camp in association with Aravind Eye Hospital, SRIET Auditorium, 9 a.m.
title: In Coimbatore Today
